title: origin and goal of history KARL JASPERS
description:
Karl Jaspers was married with a jewish woman and , being a doctor , he took the 

decision of


carrying he and his wife

a pile of poison in prevention of being arrested by the Gestapo during the dark days 

of the nazi system.




This was the man who wrote in 1949 this book , being an assessment of the whole of

human experience and tradition , what usually we name "History".
